T

testDeepCopy() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the deepCopy method of the Board class The deepCopy method creates a new board with the same fields as the board it deepCopied.
testGameOver() - Method in class gamelogic.test.GameMethodTest
This method tests if the game is indeed over when the game has a winner or is a draw by passing in multiple inputs continuously.
testHasCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the hasRow method of the Board class with which returns a boolean indicating if a mark controls any row on the board or not.
testHasNoWinnerGameOver() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
 
testHasRow() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the hasRow method of the Board class with which returns a boolean indicating if a mark controls any row on the board or not.
testHasWinnerCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the hasWinner method of the Board class which returns a boolean indicating if a mark controls any row, column, or diagonal on the board or not.
testHasWinnerDiagonal() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the hasWinner method of the Board class which returns a boolean indicating if a mark controls any row, column, or diagonal on the board or not.
testHasWinnerRow() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the hasWinner method of the Board class which returns a boolean indicating if a mark controls any row, column, or diagonal on the board or not.
testIndexArr() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the index(row, col) of the Board class.
testIndexRowCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the index(row, col) of the Board class.
testInstanceOf() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This test requires JUnit 5.8.1 and won't run in lower versions.
testIsEmptyFieldIndex() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isEmptyField of the Board class with index as its parameter which returns a boolean indicating if the field is empty or not.
testIsEmptyFieldRowCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isEmptyField of the Board class with rows and columns as its parameter which returns a boolean indicating if the field is empty or not.
testIsFieldIndex() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isField(int index) of the Board class.
testIsFieldRowCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isField(int row, int col) of the Board class.
testIsFull() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
 
testIsRotation() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isRotation method of the Board class which returns a boolean indicating if the int rotation passed as the parameter is valid or not.
testIsWinner() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the isWinner method of the Board class which returns a boolean indicating if a particular mark controls any row, column, or diagonal on the board or not.
testPlacementAndRotation() - Method in class gamelogic.test.GameMethodTest
This method tests if placement of the marbles on the game board is indeed correct according to the user input.
testRandom() - Method in class gamelogic.test.GameMethodTest
This method tests if the game indeed got over at the end after placing random moves on the board by using the hint functionality of the game which returns a random legal move.
testReset() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the reset method of the Board class The reset method sets all the fields of the board to be empty.
testRotationBottomLeftClockwise() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the rotatePart method of the Board class which rotates the board.
testRotationBottomLeftCounterClockwise() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the rotatePart method of the Board class which rotates the board.

This method tests the rotatePart method of the Board class which rotates the board.

This method tests the rotatePart method of the Board class which rotates the board.

This method tests the rotatePart method of the Board class which rotates the board.
testRowAndColEqualsIndex() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests if the row and col data equals to the index data provided.
testSetAndGetFieldIndex() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the setField(int index) and getField(int index) of the Board class.
testSetAndGetFieldRowCol() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the setField and getField of the Board class but giving rows and columns as parameters now instead of indexes.
testSetup() - Method in class gamelogic.test.BoardMethodTest
This method tests the initial setup of the board.
testWinner() - Method in class gamelogic.test.GameMethodTest
This method tests if there is indeed a winner on the board and the winner is correct.
